en.title: How to Spend Your Kitten's First Day Home | 5 Tips to Help Them Feel Safe
en.content:
The first day home is a major change of environment for a kitten. Here are the key points to help them feel secure.

5 Key Tips

1. Start with a Small Space

Instead of opening up the entire house at once, start with one room. Place the litter box, food, water, and a hiding spot nearby.

2. Keep the Environment Quiet

Turn down the TV volume, avoid loud voices, and keep things calm. Avoid having the whole family gather around the kitten at once.

3. Don't Force Interaction

If the kitten hides, don't force it out. Let it explore at its own pace. When it shows interest, speak to it gently.

4. Keep the Same Food

Continue feeding the same food the kitten was eating at the breeder's. Changing the environment and food at the same time puts stress on the digestive system.

5. Show Them the Litter Box

Right after arrival, take the kitten to the litter box to let it know where it is.

What to Expect on Day One

Hiding, decreased appetite, and meowing are all normal reactions. If the kitten is drinking water and showing no dangerous symptoms, watch over it for 1 to 2 days. If you are worried, you can reach out to Fuluck Cattery via LINE.

zh.title: 小猫到家第一天的度过方式 | 让它安心的5个要点
zh.content:
到家的第一天对小猫来说是巨大的环境变化。请掌握以下要点，帮助它感到安心。

5个关键要点

1. 从小空间开始

不要一开始就开放整个家，先从一个房间开始。将猫厕所、食物、水和藏身处放在附近。

2. 保持安静的环境

降低电视音量，不要大声说话，保持安静。避免全家人同时围着小猫。

3. 不要勉强互动

如果小猫躲起来了，不要硬把它拉出来。让它按自己的节奏探索。当它表现出兴趣时，温柔地跟它说话。

4. 保持相同的食物

继续喂食小猫在繁殖者处吃的同款猫粮。同时更换环境和食物会给消化系统带来负担。

5. 告知猫厕所位置

到家后立即带小猫去猫厕所，让它知道位置。

第一天可能出现的情况

躲藏、食欲下降、叫唤都是正常反应。只要小猫在喝水且没有危险症状，观察1-2天即可。如果担心的话，可以通过LINE联系福楽猫舍咨询。
